data.name: Sandwalkers: The Fourteenth Caravan
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist the full game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1639080/Sandwalkers/


About the Game

Sandwalkers: The Fourteenth Caravan is the free prologue of the full game Sandwalkers.

Introduction:



  • Play as the Fourteenth Caravan and discover one of your ancestors' secrets, which will rekindle the hope of ending the Phithi era someday.
  • Every decade, the tree city of Lecwasi sends a caravan of merchants and diplomats into the Phithi, the meteorological chaos ravaging the world of Uwando.
  • Convoy goods to neighboring tribes, build relationships, survive the creatures that roam around the Phithi, and collect memories of your journey to send to your successors.

Features:



  • Guide a caravan of adventurers through ever-changing landscapes.
  • Fight and survive in the face of acid rain, sandstorms and heat waves.
  • Tame hostile creatures, rescue refugees, seek allies for mutual aid, or follow the blood path and loot everything you can.
  • Seek rich arable soil to plant a new tree city for your people.
  • Progress by passing on your knowledge to a new caravan.
  • Repair the broken climate, and put an end to centuries of wandering.

data.short_description: Sandwalkers is a roguelike turn-based exploration game. In this free prologue, play as the Fourteenth Caravan and convoy goods to neighboring tribes, build relationships, survive hostile creatures and more.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro, NVIDIA GTX 660 Ti, or AMD Radeon HD 7870 w/ 1024 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
